member.name: P:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.FAQPlusPlus.Properties.Resource.WelcomeTeamCardContent
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Hi! I am {0}, thank you for having me in your SME team!.I am a friendly HR bot can be used by any team or individual within the org. As an SME, you and your team memebers can do following things using bot.
- Can Self assign the tickets raised by the users.
- Can directly chat with end user using chat buttons.
- Your team can keep track of all the user queries using staus fields like open assign and close.,.
